channel.title: Objects Appearring and then Dissappearing?
channel.description: Well, some of my objects on my server disappear and reappear and then just on and on. I really don't know how to change it. Like for example, if I tele to fire altar the altar is there for 1 sec then disappears. Anyone know how to fix it? :confused:

item.title: Objects Appearring and then Dissappearing?
item.dc:creator: @dragon_boy dragon boy
item.description:
@dragon_boy wrote:

[quote=“zubmage, post:2, topic:193503”]Ah, I think I see whats wrong.

The fire altar may have been removed. When you remove an object, and teleport to the location, it blinks and then isn’t visible.[/quote]
My other rc altars work tho. Yea it blinks. Let me check my coding again to see if it is still there.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 27, 2008, 04:36:01 PM[/size][hr]Hmm the same thing happens to my dungeon, but the code is not removed. Got any solutions?

Read full topic
